basics.name: Hélène Jonin
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I try to solve some problems with code. Sometimes, I sing.

education.area: Computer Science and Human Computer Interaction
education.institution: Université Paul Sabatier / Edinburgh Napier University

work.summary:
Contributing to Software Heritage projects related to archive metadata in JavaScript and Python/Django.
Software Heritage is a foundation, which mission is to preserve all software.
work.name: Software Heritage

highlights: Developed office website (code.gouv.fr) and open source tools for public administrations (such as eleventy-dsfr) in JavaScript with Eleventy.
Spoke at several events (including university talks, and a radio interview) to promote the use of free software in public administrations.
Managed and trained a team of 6 interns during 6 months as part of the BlueHats Semester of Code programme.
work.summary: Wrote code and advocated for FLOSS in public administrations within an OSPO.
work.name: DINUM

highlights: Acculturation to French administration, and paper and digital preservation practices.
Developed an open source file transfer application prototype for archivists in TypeScript with Angular.
work.summary: 1 year immersion into the Programme Vitam, a French inter-ministerial programme developing an open source digital preservation software.
work.name: Ministère de la Culture

highlights: Helped to refactor backend including Java Spring "bootification".
Helped to ops and frontend migration.
work.summary: Was part of the SkyBreathe® Fuel Efficiency development team again to modernize the application.
work.name: OpenAirlines

highlights: Integrated algorithms into cloud pipelines (using AWS managed services).
work.summary: Was part of a project that aimed to enable level 4 autonomous driving.
work.name: Continental Automotive

highlights: Developed an open source data integration cloud application in Python (using GCP).
Developed new features in HTML/CSS/JavaScript for corporate and internal websites.
work.summary: 1 year immersion into the Marketing Team of a French open source software company.
work.name: Nuxeo
work.position: Web Developer ("Volontariat International en Entreprise" programme)

highlights: Implemented backend web services in Java with Spring MVC and integrated frontend in JavaScript.
Developed flight data parsers in Java and Python.
work.summary: Was part of the development team of the SkyBreathe® Fuel Efficiency web application, a fuel efficiency software for airlines.
work.name: OpenAirlines

highlights: Completed a 3 months internship for a small e-commerce company (x2i).
Completed a 3 months internship for the Computer Science laboratory of Toulouse (IRIT).
Completed a 6 months internship for Airbus Defense & Space.
work.name: Various

keywords: Playing the Flute and the Guitar
